channel.title: Klipsch on LouderVoice Customer Reviews
channel.description: Recent content in Klipsch on LouderVoice Customer Reviews

item.title: Klipsch USA Pumps Up The Volume with LouderVoice
item.description:
We really are jumping up and down with excitement to finally announce that LouderVoice’s first US client went live just before Le Web recently.Â Klipsch USA now has the LouderVoice customer review system across the entire klipsch.com web-site.

For those in Europe not familiar with this legendary US brand, it had defined high-end audio since 1946 and is adored by audiophiles everywhere.

item.title: Final Competition Winner
item.description:
We should have posted this before Christmas but the finalÂ winner in the Three competition was Gabriel Kelly from Carrigaline in Cork for her review of theÂ Philips DCP951/05.

Â 

Â Â Â 

Â 

One of the prize phones fromÂ ThreeÂ and Custom-1 headphones fromÂ KlipschÂ are already on their way to her.

Well done to all the winners and thanks again to George Hook for making this all happen.

We’ll be kicking off some new competitions shortly. Keep an eye out here, on TwitterÂ or on the site itself for details.

item.title: Competition Winner Week 3
item.description:
The third winner in the Three competition on The Right Hook has been announced onÂ Georgeâ€™s radio show. It is SarahMcÂ from Waterford who wrote a review of a very interesting device called the Scansound Unilateral Stereo Headphone. This sends both stereo channels into one earpiece for people who are deaf in one ear. Fantastic device and really informative review from Sarah!

Â 

Â Â Â 

Â 

One of the prize phones fromÂ ThreeÂ and Custom-1 headphones fromÂ KlipschÂ will shortly be on their way to her.

item.title: Competition Winner Week 2
item.description:
The second winner in the Three competition on The Right Hook has been announced onÂ Georgeâ€™s radio show. It is Castle Tunes from Dublin who wroteÂ a very detailed review of the Squeezebox Boom.

Â 

Â Â Â 

Â 

One of the prize phones fromÂ ThreeÂ and Custom-1 headphones fromÂ KlipschÂ will shortly be on their way to Dublin.

There are another two weeks left in the competition. So getÂ writing gadget reviewsÂ on the site or via SMS. The winner will be announced each Monday on the show which you can also listen to on the Newstalk web-site.

item.title: Competition Winner Week 1
item.description:
The first winner in the Three competition on The Right Hook has been announced on George’s radio show. It is Snowgirl from Thurles who wrote [The first winner in the Three competition on The Right Hook has been announced on George’s radio show. It is Snowgirl from Thurles who wrote]2 of the Sony Ericsson C905 phone. Our favourite line in the review was: “a camera that can call people”.

item.title: Three Ireland Competition Launches
item.description:
Â Â 

Three Ireland Reviewing Competition

Three IrelandÂ in conjunction withÂ Newstalk Radio,Â KlipschÂ and LouderVoice have just launched a reviewing competition for listeners in Ireland of George Hook on theÂ Right Hook Radio Show.

Each week for the next four weeks, the best reviewer can win a Three Ireland handset plus Klipsch Custom-1 headphones. You can send reviews by SMS or write them directly here on the site

The Prizes

Click on the thumbnails for full information on each prize.

item.title: Klipsch.co.uk goes live
item.description:
We are incredibly happy to announce that Klipsch has just launched its UK specific site. Not only are they selling amazing audio equipment but the reviews there are powered by LouderVoice.

When you are investing Â£1000 in a sub-woofer, you want to be sure you are picking the right one. Reviews by other customers can help you make that decision. The Klipsch guys understand that those reviews are a win-win for everyone.
